paper.title: An Abstract Machine for Oz

paper.venue: International Symposium on Programming Language Implementation and Logic Programming
paper.abstract: Oz is a concurrent constraint language providing for firstclass procedures, concurrent objects, and encapsulated search. DFKI Oz is an interactive implementation of Oz competitive in performance with commercial Prolog and Lisp systems. This paper describes Amoz, the abstract machine underlying DFKI Oz. Amoz implements rational tree constraints, first-class procedures, local computation spaces for deep guards, and preemptive and fair threads.
